Text: ....your welcome ... if you can imagine "winamp" running the AVS Gfx plugin (and the title plugin) in full screen then thats what this is ....gfx change every 15 secs .. being a Beatles fan I did it for myself for parties ect ... looked pretty cool so just thought I,d share it....!!!

Hola Seboz, te agradezco que por favor me indique como hiciste este DVD con los Beatles, usaste algun software o un plugin?

Gracias
